DataElement.preferredName: Cancer and Aging Research Group Chemo Toxicity Calculator Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The percentage score calculated from a clinical assessment tool designed to evaluate the risk for chemotherapy toxicity in geriatric cancer patients.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer and Aging Research Group Chemo Toxicity Calculator Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A clinical assessment tool designed to evaluate the risk for chemotherapy toxicity in geriatric cancer patients.
